title: Official verification
content:
Beware of scammers. Enter your email address, phone number, 
 Telegram nickname to check if the source is verified and officially
 belongs to the Dust Foundation.

modal.not_verified_source_content: The source you entered is not an official Dust Foundation domain. Please be careful and only interact with verified official Dust Founadation sources.
modal.verified_source_content: The source you entered is verified and is an official Dust Foundation domain.
